question: I have the exact same symptoms as "eyeman415".  I have weird muscle stiffness in hands legs and especially neck!  I am 7 months pregnant with my second child and told have gestational diabetes.  It is making me depressed as sometimes I can't even walk or turn my head without getting stuck.  I need a Neurologist or Endo dr. who specializes in this anti-gad.  I will pay top dollar to get rid of these symptoms and donate to research of this horrible disease.  By the way...these symptoms went away immediately after the birth of my first son.  I hope it does the same for the second.  I'm just concerned for the 9 months of terror I'm living.  Christina     email is ***@****.   Please help me find a doctor who cares and will research and get to the bottom of this.This discussion is related to/posts/show/531244.
title: Is there a Dr. who specializes in anti-gad muscle stiffness in pregnancy
